document.full_text: azerbaijan police detained more than 30 activists of the opposition musavat party when its members took to the street of baku on saturday to protest against the ruling elite following a similar rally a day before.
document.title: police break up opposition rally in azerbaijan
lines_and_colors: azerbaijan police detained more than 30 activists of the opposition musavat party when its members took to the street of baku on saturday to protest against the ruling elite following a similar rally a day before.
